thread.title: Katy Perry is a good sport as she gets groped by overzealous fan on stage
thread.title_full: Katy Perry is a good sport as she gets groped by overzealous fan on stage

title: Katy Perry is a good sport as she gets groped by overzealous fan on stage
text:
Katy Perry is a good sport as she gets groped by overzealous fan on stage Katy Perry is a good sport as she gets groped by overzealous fan on stage 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Pop star Katy Perry got more love than she was expecting when she invited a fan on stage during her Rock In Rio concert in Brazil on Monday. 
The fan gave her idol a big hug – but that wasn’t all. “She’s kissing my neck!” a surprised Katy told the audience. 
The 30-year-old quickly realised that her affectionate fan was under the influence as she rested her head on her bosom. “That’s my boob!” she yelped, adding: “I think she’s rolling”– that is, high on ecstasy. 
But Katy soon got the situation in hand, making a joke of her struggle to pronounce the young woman’s name – Rayane – and asking her to teach her some words of Portuguese. 
The singer was surprised to learn that “pizza” is also “pizza”. 
As Rayane repeatedly tried to kiss her, Katy suggested a selfie, before seeing her off stage with a pat on her behind. A LINGUINHA DELA DJSJDJAJDUDKSKDQIJDNS pic.twitter.com/HoN1s8lQ8U 
The I Kissed A Girl singer joked as Rayane made her exit: “You’re not my first, and you won’t be my last.” Share article 
Katy is currently on the South American leg of her Prismatic World Tour, which will finish in Costa Rica on October 18. Promoted Stories
